txt.en: Across the Ashenslades, there are small packs of Wargs that harass Malledhrim patrols through the area.

'Across the Ashenslades, there are small packs of Wargs that have been harrassing our patrols through the area. These beasts must be taught to fear the Malledhrim.

'Therefore, I ask that you hunt the Wargs of the Ashenslades and collect their teeth as a warning to their brethren.

'Wargs can be found throughout the Ashenslades, but they have also established a den to the south of here, near the ruins of Naur-hoit.'
Wargs can be found throughout the Ashenslades, but many are gathered to the south of Mithechad, near Naur-hoit.\n  \nPerindúr has asked you to hunt down and defeat the Wargs of the Ashenslades.
'I once again thank you for your service, [placeholder]. These beasts have long been the bane of any excursion into the Ashenslades.'
Perindúr is at Mithechad, north of Naur-hoit.\n\nYou should return to Perindúr and tell him of your success in the hunt.
'Seek out and defeat the Wargs of the Ashenslades and collect their teeth as a warning to their brethren.'
